dmca.title: [EV1-C1157351N] FWD: Illegal access to Everyone Internet
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] 
Posted At: Friday, September 29, 2006 3:02 PM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: [EV1-C1157351N] FWD: Illegal access to Everyone Internet
Subject: [EV1-C1157351N] FWD: Illegal access to Everyone Internet


==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. FWD: Illegal access to Everyone Internet Added by system at Friday,
Sep 29 2006 12:46 am
X-MailFrom: customerservice@ev1.net
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net
Received: from [207.218.192.20] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Fri Sep 29 00:45:32 2006
Received: from SMTP32-FWD by mail.ev1.net
  (SMTP32) id A00000364; Fri, 29 Sep 2006 00:44:40 -0500
Date: Fri, 29 Sep 2006 00:44:36 -0500
Message-Id: <200609290044.AA11862228@mail.ev1.net>
Mime-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
From: "EV1.net Customer Service" <customerservice@ev1.net>
Reply-To: <customerservice@ev1.net>
X-Sender: <customerservice@mail.ev1.net>
To: "EV1 Abuse Team"  <abuse@ev1.net>
Subject: FWD: Illegal access to Everyone Internet
X-Mailer: <IMail v6.05> 

MIME element (text/plain)
---------- Original Message ----------------------------------
From: "Mark Khayter" <mkhayter@ComplianceDoc.com>
Date: Thu, 28 Sep 2006 09:57:00 -0400 
 
Dear Customer Representative, 
 
We have determined that one of your customers is performing illegal
activities through your site. 
 
Your customer with an IP Address: 67.15.16.30 accessed our site and has
been downloading copyrighted materials from our site
www.ComplianceDoc.com . We have posted a message for that person before
when they accessed site at prior time (couple of weeks ago) also using
Everyone Internet but different IP address. That means that person has
been notified that activities they performed are illegal and we asked
the person to contact us if it is misunderstanding. There has been no
response. 
Today's access was between 2:31AM and 9:13AM Boston time. 
 
Please attend to the manner immediately before it is unnecessarily
escalates. 
 
Regards,
Mark Khayter
617-512-5967
mkhayter@ComplianceDoc.com
